title: Project Standards Schema
description: Schema for validating quality standards for different project types

projectType.description: Unique identifier for the project type in kebab-case

description.description: Human-readable description of what this project type represents

principles.description: Core development principles guiding this project type

validationRules.description: Rules for validating inputs and deliverables

qualityCriteria.description: The 6 dimensions of quality and how they apply to this project type

completeness.description: How complete the deliverable should be

correctness.description: How correct or accurate the deliverable should be

consistency.description: How consistent the deliverable should be with standards

performance.description: Performance expectations for this project type

security.description: Security considerations for this project type

maintainability.description: How maintainable or extensible the deliverable should be

commonPatterns.description: Common patterns and best practices for this project type

antiPatterns.description: Patterns to avoid in this project type
